title: ninu kolichi
sahitya:
ninnu kolici kOritini nikhila lOka rakSaka

anupallavi

 prannani nIdu pAda sEva palumAru nEnu jEyuTaku

caraNam

 tannutAnE meccu koni dalapulyAka tiruguccunna kannavAritOnE pOyi
gatilEka sadAyuNDunaTlu pannugApatituDaku nannu brOcuTaku nIkarudA vidhi

madhyamakAlam

sannuta murahara giridharannana sukha kara madanuni
 kanna shrInivAsa nAdu vinnapamu vini brOvuvani
